metadata.title: CVE-2016-0832 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Setup Wizard in Android 5.1.x before LMY49H and 6.x before 2016-03-01allows physically proximate attackers to bypass the Factory ResetProtection protection mechanism and delete data via unspecified vectors,aka internal bug 25955042.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
